resource_dependency.dashboard_layout_template: A responsive grid-based layout system with header, sidebar navigation, main content area, and footer

function: Display a dashboard interface with mint cream background and teal-stonented components
static_description: The dashboard features a mint cream background with teal-themed UI components including headers, cards, buttons, and navigation elements arranged in a responsive grid layout.

interaction_and_states.description: Navigation menu items change active state highlight to teal when selected.
Teal-themed buttons and interactive elements show subtle hover effects such as darkened background or shadow enhancement.

resource_dependency.company_data_schema: Database table 'companies' with fields: company_id (UUID), name (string), industry (string), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)
resource_dependency.financial_data_schema: Database table 'financial_data' with fields: data_id (UUID), company_id (foreign key), period_start (date), period_end (date), revenue (decimal), expenses (decimal), profit (decimal), assets (decimal), liabilities (decimal), equity (decimal), cash_flow (decimal), created_at (timestamp), updated_at (timestamp)

function: Support multi-company financial data collection and storage
static_description: Backend database schema supporting storage of multiple companies and their associated financial records with proper relationships defined between entities.

resource_dependency.company_financial_view_template: Tabular display showing columns for financial periods, revenue, expenses, profit, assets, liabilities, equity, and cash flow
resource_dependency.pagination_component: Pagination controls for browsing through large datasets

function: Show individual company financial data in browseable format
static_description: A tabular view displaying financial data for a selected company with pagination controls at the bottom for navigating through multiple pages of data.

interaction_and_states.description: Pagination buttons load next/previous page of financial data without refreshing the entire page.

resource_dependency.consolidated_report_schema: Database view or materialized view aggregating total revenue, expenses, profit, assets, liabilities, equity across all companies grouped by time periods
resource_dependency.reporting_api: Internal service endpoint /api/reports/consolidated returning aggregated financial metrics

function: Provide consolidated financial reports across all companies
static_description: Dedicated report section presenting aggregated financial summaries across all registered companies, displayed in both tabular and chart formats.

interaction_and_states.description: Refresh button triggers regeneration of consolidated report data from latest available inputs.

resource_dependency.comparison_chart_library: Chart.js or similar library for rendering bar/line charts comparing financial metrics

function: Enable cross-company financial data comparison functionality
static_description: Interactive visualization panel allowing users to select two or more companies and compare chosen financial metrics over selected time intervals using bar or line graphs.

interaction_and_states.description: Company checkboxes toggle inclusion in the comparison dataset; metric dropdown changes which financial value is being compared.
Mouse hovering over chart segments highlights corresponding data points and displays tooltip with exact values.

resource_dependency.management_tool_icons: Set of SVG icons representing actions like 'edit', 'delete', 'approve', 'recolate'
resource_dependency.form_templates: Pre-built forms for editing financial entries and submitting adjustments

function: Include financial management tools for user interaction
static_description: Toolbar containing actionable icons for managing financial data entries including editing, deleting, approving, and recalculating values.

interaction_and_states.description: Each tool icon opens respective modal form or performs inline operation depending on context.

resource_dependency.report_generation_engine: Service capable of generating PDF/XLSX reports based on query parameters
resource_dependency.template_files: Pre-designed templates for standard financial report layouts

function: Offer reporting capabilities for financial data analysis
static_description: Report generation interface providing options to choose report type, date range, and output format before exporting analytical summaries.

interaction_and_states.description: Generate Report button initiates creation process and downloads file once ready.

resource_dependency.company_selector_dropdown: Dropdown component populated with company names fetched from /api/companies
resource_dependency.selected_company_state: State variable storing currently viewed company ID

function: Implement company selection mechanism for viewing specific financial data
static_description: Dropdown selector positioned prominently at top of dashboard listing all registered companies for quick switching between views.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a company updates displayed financial data and related components to reflect that entity's information.

resource_dependency.polling_interval_config: Configurable interval setting for periodic data refresh (default: 5 minutes)

function: Display real-time or periodic financial data updates
static_description: Dashboard automatically refreshes financial data either via WebSocket connection for instant updates or scheduled polling mechanism.

interaction_and_states.description: Manual refresh button forces immediate reload of current financial data regardless of auto-update settings.

resource_dependency.date_range_picker_component: UI widget enabling selection of start and end dates

function: Provide filtering options for financial data by date ranges
static_description: Date range picker control located above data tables allowing users to specify custom time windows for displayed financial information.

interaction_and_states.description: Apply Filter button sends selected dates to backend and filters displayed results accordingly.

function: Include export functionality for financial reports
static_description: Export toolbar offering download links for saving current report or filtered data set in various document formats.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing an export option triggers download of generated file matching current view configuration.

resource_dependency.auth_database_schema: Users table with fields: user_id (UUID), username (string), password_hash (string), role (enum: admin/user), last_login (timestamp)
resource_dependency.login_page_template: Secure login screen prompting for credentials

function: Support user authentication and authorization for dashboard access
static_description: Login portal requiring valid username/password combination prior to granting access to dashboard functionalities, with role-based permission checks applied throughout application.

interaction_and_states.description: Submit button validates entered credentials against stored hashes and redirects authenticated users to dashboard.

resource_dependency.audit_log_schema: Table 'audit_logs' tracking event_type (string), user_id (foreign key), target_record_id (UUID), old_values (JSON), new_values (JSON), timestamp (timestamp)
resource_dependency.log_viewer_interface: Read-only audit trail viewer accessible only to administrators

function: Maintain audit trails for financial data modifications
static_description: System maintains detailed logs of every modification made to financial records including who performed the change, what was altered, and when it occurred.

resource_dependency.view_preferences_storage: User preference object saved per user in database including layout choices, default filters, favorite reports
resource_dependency.customization_modal_template: Modal dialog for adjusting personal dashboard settings

function: Enable customizable dashboard views for different user preferences
static_description: Gear icon in upper right corner opens customization panel where users can adjust layout configurations, save preferred filters, and manage frequently accessed reports.

interaction_and_states.description: Save Preferences button persists current layout and filter selections for future sessions under logged-in user profile.

resource_dependency.data_visualization_library: D3.js or Chart.js integrated for dynamic metric representation

function: Integrate data visualization components for financial metrics display
static_description: Interactive charts and graphs embedded within dashboard panels visualizing key financial indicators such as revenue trends, expense distributions, and profitability ratios.

interaction_and_states.description: Mouseover events on chart elements reveal detailed tooltips showing precise numerical values and contextual labels.
Drill-down clicks on certain chart areas redirect to full-detail pages or expand additional layers of underlying data.
